title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2030/80 of 30 July 1980 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1596/79 on preventive withdrawals of apples and pears
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2030/80  of 30 July 1980  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1596/79 on preventive withdrawals of apples and pears
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1596/79 is amended as follows:    1. In Article 2, "eight successive market days" is replaced by "five successive market days".
2. In Article 3 (2), "10 mm" is replaced by "15 mm".
3. In the first indent of Article 4, "Belle de boscoop" is added after "Imperatore".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
